line.text: If thou survive my well-contented day
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When that churl death my bones with dust shall cover
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And shalt by fortune once more re-survey
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: These poor rude lines of thy deceased lover
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Compare them with the bettring of the time
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And though they be outstripped by every pen
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Reserve them for my love not for their rhyme
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Exceeded by the height of happier men
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O then vouchsafe me but this loving thought
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Had my friend Muse grown with this growing age
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A dearer birth than this his love had brought
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To march in ranks of better equipage
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But since he died and poets better prove
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Theirs for their style Ill read his for his love
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
